songs.title: Wonderful Christmas Time
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The moon is right
The spirits up
We're here tonight
And that's enough

[Chorus]
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time

[Verse 2]
The party is on
The feeling is here
That only comes
This time of year

[Chorus]
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time

[Verse 3]
The choir of children sing their song
Ding dong, ding dong
Ding dong, ding Oh
Oh

[Chorus]
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time

[Verse 4]
The word is out
About the town
To lift a glass
Ah don't look down

[Chorus]
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time

[Verse 5]
The choir of children sing their song
They practiced all year long
Ding dong, ding dong
Ding dong, ding dong
Ding dong, ding dong

The party's on
The spirits up
We're here tonight
And that's enough

[Chorus]
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time

[Verse 6]
The moon is right
The spirits up
We're here tonight
And that's enough

[Chorus]
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time
Simply having a wonderful Christmas time

[Outro]
OHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Christmas time
